'''D-Link DSL-2500U/BRU/D rev. D3''' :ADSL/ADSL2/ADSL2+ modem (Router/Bridge)
The processor is part BCM6332KFBG.
===Links=== * [http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dsl-2500u ''D-Link DSL-2500U'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] * [ftp://ftp.dlink.ru/pub/ADSL/DSL-2500U_BRU_D/ ''DSL-2500U/BRU/D'' directory on '''D-link FTP''' archive] * [http://pudeev.livejournal.com/35872.html ''D-Link DSL-25xxU/BRU/x'' on the blog of Michael V. Pudeev] (RU) * [http://chairday.narod.ru/DSL-2500U.html ''Reconnect PPPoE on modem DSL-2500U''] (RU) * [http://adslhw.pskov.ru ''ADSL Modem Hardware''] (RU)
